WorkItem.Description: When you have the "Always show Error List if build finishes with errors" in visual studio options the error list is not shown even if a compile results in typescript errors in the error list.

Comments.Message: Which version of TypeScript and Visual Studio do you see this in? Does it depend on the kind of project?
Using typescript 0.9.5.0 and visual studio pro 2013 with web essentials installed.

Can you re-open with the exact set of steps to reproduce the problem? I'm seeing the error list pop up correctly as it does in C# / etc

** Closed by RyanCavanaugh 12/16/2013 12:40PM

I believe the problem here is that the project was originally a Visual Studio 2010 project which was upgraded and opened in Visual Studio 2013.

I created a new project in VS 2013 and imported files into it and it worked as expected.
